fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Censor somebody at night, preventing them from acting until you die.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Evil factional members and neutral killings you censor learn who you are.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__ - If part of the Daily Streak Faction, the first attribute does not apply.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rid the town of all dissidents to the Sentries.
